content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at (-15, -50)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-15, -50) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-14, -48) smelting iron plates
Currently working but output is blocked

### Additional Iron Smelters
Two stone furnaces at:
- Position (0, 0)
- Position (2, 0)
Both currently idle with no ingredients

### Copper Plate Production at (4, 4)
Two stone furnaces at:
- Position (4, 4) with 30 copper plates in output
- Position (6, 4) with 6 copper plates in output
Both currently idle with no ingredients

### Power Generation System at (-9.5, 24.5)
Complete power generation setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Boiler at (-2, 23.5)
- Steam engine at (9.5, 19.5)
- Connected via pipe networks
- Electric poles connecting to lab
System is partially working but boiler needs fuel

### Research Lab at (0.5, 8.5)
- Lab with 7 automation science packs
- Connected to power network but currently has no power
- Researching automation technology

# ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items into machines
- Ensure you have required raw materials before crafting
- Gather required resources (like wood) before attempting to craft items that need them

### Entity Placement Errors
- Ensure you have the required entity in inventory before attempting to place it
- When placing connected systems (like power or fluid), build and connect all required components

### Recipe and Crafting Errors
- Some items (like copper plates, iron plates) cannot be crafted directly - they need a furnace
- Check all required ingredients and sub-ingredients before starting complex crafting chains

### API Usage Errors
- Cannot use ModelPrivateAttr directly with integers (found in boiler width calculation)
- When connecting entities, ensure you have all required connection items (like pipes) in inventory

### Machine Operation Errors
- Ensure machines have fuel before expecting them to operate
- Check for blocked outputs on mining drills
- Verify power connections are complete and working before expecting powered machines to function
